name: timeless shawl - sultan deluxe
notes:
our skilled danish designers created this simple and pretty [timeless shawl][1]. we know this will be your new, everlasting favourite. the shawl is worked in cotton kings sultan deluxe]. this yarn is a soft and fantastic "cake yarn", available in a wide range of beautiful colour combinations with long gradient colourways. pick your favourite colour and leave it up to sultan deluxe to create your timeless shawl. have fun!

**materials:**
- cotton kings sultan deluxe
- crochet hook 4 mm (us size g/6)

**measurements:** 
approx. 170 x 66 cm

**gauge:** 
20 s x 13 rows = 10x10 cm (4x4 inch.)

**usage:** 
1 ball sultan deluxe

**abbreviations:**
**ch**: chain stitch
**st**: stitch / stitches
**sc**: single crochet
**dc**: double crochet
**tr**: treble crochet
**fpdc**: front post double crochet 
**bpdc**: back post double crochet 
**ch-space**: chain-space


  [1]: https://hobbii.com/timeless-shawl-sultan-deluxe?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=timeless-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
